'''2.3.280''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on July 6, 2022.

== Changes ==
* Improvements to game installation flow.
* Updates to new installation drop down.

== Fixes ==
* Fixes to some localization bugs.
* {{bug|MCL-17557}} - Holding windows & clicking on buttons in the MCL.
* {{bug|MCL-21233}} - The "What's New" button displayed within the main menu of the launcher is missing a question mark.
